sentences.english: He lived with his parents on Park Avenue and spent his nights in Greenwich Village.
sentences.chinese: 他與父母在帕克大街生活，晚上則到格林尼治村度過。

sentences.english: Chief Engineer, please standby engine by 1300 GMT.
sentences.chinese: 輪機長，請在格林尼治時間1300時前備車。

sentences.english: Third Officer, we are about to sail at 1400 GMT.
sentences.chinese: 三副，我們準備格林尼治時間1400時開航。
